languages.text: "Адептус Арбитес требуется другой, более способный руководитель. Я повелеваю выбрать нового маршала. И пусть он учтет, что династия фон Валанциус более не потерпит вмешательства Арбитес в дела протектората".

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Адептус Арбитес требуется другой, более способный руководитель. Я повелеваю выбрать нового маршала. И пусть он учтет, что династия фон Валанциус более не потерпит вмешательства Арбитес в дела протектората".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And may you take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And may you take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

"The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

languages.text: "Das Adeptus Arbites braucht einen kompetenteren Anführer. Ich befehle Euch, einen neuen Marschall zu wählen. Und sagt ihm, dass die Dynastie derer von Valancius zukünftig keine Einmischungen der Arbites in die Angelegenheiten des Protektorats mehr akzeptieren wird."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Das Adeptus Arbites braucht einen kompetenteren Anführer. Ich befehle Euch, einen neuen Marschall zu wählen. Und sagt ihm, dass die Dynastie derer von Valancius zukünftig keine Einmischungen der Arbites in die Angelegenheiten des Protektorats mehr akzeptieren wird."

"Das Adeptus Arbites braucht einen kompetenteren Anführer. Ich befehle Euch, einen neuen Marschall zu wählen. Und sagt ihm, dass die Dynastie derer von Valancius für die Arbites ab sofort unantastbar ist.

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites a besoin d'un dirigeant plus capable. Je vous ordonne de choisir un nouveau maréchal. Vous lui ferez savoir que la dynastie von Valancius ne tolérera plus la moindre interférence de la part de l'Arbites dans les affaires du protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites a besoin d'un dirigeant plus capable. Je vous ordonne de choisir un nouveau maréchal. Vous lui ferez savoir que la dynastie von Valancius ne tolérera plus la moindre interférence de la part de l'Arbites dans les affaires du protectorat. »

« L'Adeptus Arbites a besoin d'un dirigeant plus capable. Je vous ordonne de choisir un nouveau maréchal. Vous lui ferez savoir que la dynastie von Valancius est désormais intouchable par l'Arbites. »

languages.text: “法务部需要一位更有能力的领袖，我命令你们选出一位新的元帅。另外，这件事情让新任元帅记清楚——法务部禁止以任何方式干涉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的事务。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “法务部需要一位更有能力的领袖，我命令你们选出一位新的元帅。另外，这件事情让新任元帅记清楚——法务部禁止以任何方式干涉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的事务。”
“法务部需要一位更有能力的领袖，我命令你们选出一位新的元帅。另外，这件事情让新任元帅记清楚——法务部以后不准再把手伸向冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。”

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites necesita un líder más competente. Le ordeno que elija a un nuevo Mariscal. Y que sepan que desde ahora la dinastía von Valancius no volverá a tolerar la injerencia del Arbites en asuntos del protectorado».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites necesita un líder más competente. Le ordeno que elija a un nuevo Mariscal. Y que sepan que desde ahora la dinastía von Valancius no volverá a tolerar la injerencia del Arbites en asuntos del protectorado».
«El Adeptus Arbites necesita un líder más competente. Le ordeno que elija a un nuevo Mariscal. Y que sepan que desde ahora la dinastía von Valancius es intocable para el Arbites».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局には、より有能な指導者が必要だ。新しい将帥を選ぶよう命じる。それからフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は保護領に関する干渉を、今後二度と高等裁定局に許さないことを、彼らに警告するように」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局には、より有能な指導者が必要だ。新しい将帥を選ぶよう命じる。それからフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は保護領に関する干渉を、今後二度と高等裁定局に許さないことを、彼らに警告するように」

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'in daha yetkin bir öndere ihtiyacı var. Yeni bir Miralay seçmenizi emrediyorum. Şu da bilinmelidir ki von Valancius hanedanlığı, bundan böyle Arbites'in protektora meselelerine müdahalesini kabul etmeyecektir."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites is in need of a more capable leader. I command you to choose a new Marshal. And let them take heed that the von Valancius dynasty will never again accept interference in matters of the protectorate from the Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'in daha yetkin bir öndere ihtiyacı var. Yeni bir Miralay seçmenizi emrediyorum. Şu da bilinmelidir ki von Valancius hanedanlığı, bundan böyle Arbites'in protektora meselelerine müdahalesini kabul etmeyecektir."
"Adeptus Arbites'in daha yetkin bir önere ihtiyacı var. Yeni bir Miralay seçmenizi emrediyorum. Şu da bilinmelidir ki Arbites, bundan böyle von Valancius hanedanlığına elini süremez."
